sentences.sContent: I scorched my dress when I was ironing it.
sentences.sCn: 我把自己的连衣裙熨焦了。

sentences.sContent: The leaves will scorch if you water them in the sun.
sentences.sCn: 在太阳底下浇水，叶子会枯。

words.tran: 灼热的；激烈的；讽刺的；过早硫化的
把…烧焦；严厉批评；切割；过早硫化（scorch的ing形式）
使烧焦；使枯萎（scorch的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to burn and slightly damage a surface by making it too hot; to be slightly burned by heat
